meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>ring</kanji> of gum (ゴム) (which is what Japanese people call rubber quite often) is a ring of rubber. What is a ring of rubber that people use often? It's a <vocabulary>rubber band</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 輪 is the kun'yomi vocab reading, which is わ, making this word <reading>わ</reading>ゴム.
